text: @realDonaldTrump I am going to be working for you. I won't have much time to play golf. Sept 2016. Ha ha ha. 261 times. Cost to taxpayers $137,000 mostly spent at your own golf courses. Money in your own pocket. Covid-19 out of control. 136,000 dead. Hospitals running out of PPE. Abject failure
